item.title: Real estate tycoon Barbara Corcoran sells her palatial $13.5 million New York penthouse in one day
item.description: “Shark Tank” star Barbara Corcoran has sold her iconic New York City apartment—for $1.5 million over her original asking price.

item.title: ‘I have to go where the ice exists’: Olympic figure skater Oksana Baiul lists her $1.2 million Louisiana home

item.title: U.S. stock futures rebound as Trump dismisses latest China tariff tensions: ‘It will all be fine’

item.title: If New York or California enter a recession, the entire U.S. economy would be next. So how are they doing?
item.description: As two of the country’s biggest states by GDP, their economies ‘may be canaries in the coal mine,’ one economist notes
